full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 100 of 228 776 LC2Qmax3 Alessi - Direct another one was the largest dairy in New Jersey. Q. Mr. Alessi, I'm going to ask you to get closer to the microphone please and make sure it points towards your mouth. I want to make sure everyone can hear you. A. Okay. This better now? Q. Thank you. After you worked in New Jersey, where did you go next A. We moved to Florida. Q. What kind of work do you do now? A. Now? I am retire. Q. About when did you move to Florida? A. We move early 1994. Q. What type of work did you do after moving to Florida? A. I work for a very wealthy family in the city of Palm Beach. They have a multiple properties, and I was a maintenance guy for those properties. Q. What did you do after that? A. After that I start to work at -- for myself doing the same work, the same repairman service for different families in Palm Beach. Q. For about how long were you self-employed working for different families in Palm Beach? A. About a year and a half. Q. What did you do after that? A. After that I was a -- I work for Mr. Jeffrey Epstein. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017973
